name: Johnsons Baby Clean And Protect Wipes 56S
description: Help Us "Wipe Out Waste"... in just 3 easy steps
Join us and raise money for a good cause by collecting empty Johnson's Baby Wipe packs. For every one you send in, a charity of your choice will be credited with 2p (2cents ROI).
It's so easy, and won't cost you a penny. Simply register online, download a pre paid label and send in your empty packs. Do your bit   sign up now at wipeoutwaste.co.uk
The clever people at TerraCycle will 'upcycle' the packs, transforming the waste into unique, stylish and eco responsible products that you'll want to get your hands on
Open to UK & ROI residents aged 18 or over only. Limited registration places available. Recycling scheme runs until 28.02.13
PromotionDescription: £12.50 off when you spend £50 or more on selected Baby products (excludes infant milk)
